allow: Bash(cmd /c "where flutter 2>nul || echo Flutter not in PATH")
Bash(cmd /c "dir /s /b D:\flutter*.bat 2>nul || dir /s /b C:\flutter*.bat 2>nul || echo Searching common locations...")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist D:\development\flutter\bin\flutter.bat echo Flutter found at D:\development\flutter")

Bash(cmd /c "if exist C:\flutter\bin\flutter.bat (echo C:\flutter) else if exist C:\src\flutter\bin\flutter.bat (echo C:\src\flutter) else if exist D:\flutter\bin\flutter.bat (echo D:\flutter) else echo not found")
